snippet: Alison Lundergan Grimes announced on Monday that she would take on Senator Mitch McConnell in what is likely to be one of the most costly, high-profile and sharp-elbowed races of 2014.
abstract: Alison Lundergan Grimes announced on Monday that she would take on Senator Mitch McConnell in what is likely to be one of the most costly, high-profile and sharp-elbowed races of 2014.

headline.main: Kentucky Secretary of State Will Challenge McConnell in Senate Race
